name: RhyVerse
description:
Want to experience motion capture without expensive motion capture equipment? Want to chat with others on the web with a custom avatar, but don't have a VR headset? Please enter the world of RhyVerse and start your metaverse journey!

Product Features

You can perform high-precision full-body or half-body motion capture through extremely simple peripherals (cameras), use your hands to interact with this virtual world, or say hello to friends in this world~
Support custom VRM model upload, your avatar is up to you!
Rich room styles, from small private double chat rooms to large concerts with more than 1,000 people, hold any event you want!
Interactable items, custom uploaded music, movie screenings full of atmosphere, all kinds of gameplay are up to you!
Start your metaverse social journey now!
